african.text: "When there is no enemy within, the enemies outside cannot hurt you."
"There are three friends in this world: courage, sense, and insight."
"The sight of books removes sorrows from the heart."
"No hill without gravestones, no valley without shadows."
"People think that the poor are not as wise as the rich, for if a man be wise, why is he poor?"
"All poor people ain’t black/ and all black people ain’t poor."
"Only a fool tests the depth of the water with both feet."
"A woman listens only to the advice of a fool."
"If you want to go fast, go alone. If you want to go far, go together."
"It takes a whole village to raise a child."
"An axe forgets what the tree remembers."
african.description: It is easy for someone who is hurting another person to forget the wrong and move on but the person who was hurt never forgets.
